---
description: 'Internationalization rules for 5-locale next-intl setup'
applyTo: 'messages/**/*.json,src/**/*translation*,src/**/*locale*,src/**/*i18n*'
---

# i18n

## Locales

`it` (default) | `en` | `fr` | `de` | `es` — next-intl (App Router, server-first)

## Wrapper Key (CRITICAL — ADR 0104)

ALL JSON: `{ "namespace": { ...keys } }` — missing wrapper = collision via `Object.assign()`

## Namespaces

common, auth, admin, chat, tools, settings, compliance, education, navigation, errors, welcome, metadata

## Format

camelCase ONLY (ESLint `no-kebab-case-i18n-keys`) | No hardcoded text (ESLint `no-hardcoded-italian`)

## Hooks

Client: `useTranslations('ns')` | Server: `getTranslations('ns')` | Multi-NS: `useTranslationsGlobal()` | Locale: `useLocaleContext()`

## Adding Keys

Italian first (`messages/it/`) → `npx tsx scripts/i18n-sync-namespaces.ts --add-missing` → `npm run i18n:check`

Pre-1900 formal address (Lei/Sie/Vous): `FORMAL_PROFESSORS` in `src/lib/greeting/templates/index.ts` (ADR 0064)
